name: Monster Maze (hordolur)
description:
This is the first full real game I created after all the tutorial demos etc. back in 2008

Story:

This is Ina the Monster; Ina loves to eat gem stones; Guide Ina through the maze and eat all the gems and collecting the keys while avoiding traps. Keys are used for unlocking doors and chest.  If you get hit you will lose health. Loose all your health and you'll need to restart.

Controls:    

Arrow Key Movement

Space Bar to enter/continue

“Esc” Exits game.                 “P” Pauses the game.

“S” Saves the game.              “R” Reloads the game.
